projects.title: My Projects
projects.project1Description: A clone of the popular Slack chat built with React.
projects.project2Description: An application that displays a list of posts using TypeScript and React.
projects.project3Description: An application for automated student registration using AmoCRM API and Keycloak.
projects.project4Description: A console application that parses the schedule website and counts the number of hours for teachers (JS and external libraries).
projects.project5Description: An RSS aggregator application deployed on Vercel. The project focuses on DOM manipulation, webpack, Bootstrap, and AJAX.
projects.project6Description: A console application that takes JSON/YML/YAML documents and calculates their differences. The project focuses on parsing and formatting data, application architecture design, working with trees, and writing unit tests.
